title: TITLE - 1. Form Title
tooltip: tooltip - Clearly states the purpose of the form.
novaThought: novaThought - A good title sets the right expectation. Users scan this first to confirm they're in the right place.

title: TITLE - 2. Form Description
novaThought: novaThought - The description is your emotional anchor - it reassures users they'll get the help they need.

title: TITLE - 3. Issue Type
tooltip: tooltip - Categorizes the problem for faster routing.
novaThought: novaThought - I use this field to route your request to the right specialist team. Choose accurately for fastest support!

title: TITLE - 4. Detailed Description
tooltip: tooltip - Provide as much detail as possible here.
novaThought: novaThought - The more specific details you provide here, the faster we can isolate and solve your issue. Think of it as giving me the puzzle pieces to help you.

title: TITLE - 5. Nova's Note
tooltip: tooltip - A helpful, context-aware tip from me to you!
novaThought: novaThought - I analyze patterns across user feedback to provide personalized suggestions that might help resolve common issues before submission.

title: TITLE - 6. Game Select
tooltip: tooltip - Specify which game your issue is related to.
novaThought: novaThought - Each game has its own dedicated support team with specialized knowledge of that particular title.

title: TITLE - 7. Preferred Email
tooltip: tooltip - Where you'll receive updates about your ticket.
novaThought: novaThought - I'll use this to send you personalized status updates and follow-ups. Your data is always handled securely.

title: TITLE - 8. Attachment
tooltip: tooltip - Upload screenshots or videos to provide more context.
novaThought: novaThought - Visual context helps tremendously! A screenshot often communicates what might take paragraphs to describe.

title: TITLE - 9. CAPTCHA
tooltip: tooltip - A quick check to ensure you're human.
novaThought: novaThought - While I love my AI friends, this helps keep spam bots from overwhelming our support system so humans get faster help.

title: TITLE - 10. Submit Button
tooltip: tooltip - Sends your completed form to the support team.
novaThought: novaThought - Once submitted, I'll automatically analyze your request to identify potential solutions before a human review.
